Name: Saurabh Rajpal
AboutMe:
I am an enthusiast and passionate individual who follows the mantra of whole round development. Multitasking is what keeps me engrossed and away from dull life (what is it by the way?! ).

I have been a decent student during my undergrad college scoring a CGPA of 8.77 after being a "9 point someone" 4 times out of the 8 times (aka semesters). And if you thought books were my life, let me tell you that I have around 15 podium finishes in dramatic events (like street plays, mad adds, etc.) apart from being at important organisational positions of clubs and fests including positions like: a) Vice President of Indian Society for Technical Education b) Category Head during College Tech Fest (Techtatva) c) Co-founder and cultural head of ADA (Absolute Dramatics Addiction) d) Board member of Music and Fine Arts Club e) Part of Student Council as one of the placement Coordinators f) Class Representative of my section, etc.

During my college days, I was a networking freak and was among the very few to be CCNA certified. My major industrial trainings also were involved around networking.

It's been nearly 2 years for me working as a full time employee in the IT world. I have been successful in meeting my team's expectations within deadlines and been part of many successful releases including those following AGILE Framework. I have majorly worked on the web application and mobile development areas and is now a seasoned professional in technologies like Android, Dojo, ExtJs, Javascript, RESTful web Services, etc.

Also, for being industry ready to meet up to date requirements, I have successfully completed following certifications: a) MongoDB for DBAs b) MongoDB for Java Delevopers c) OCA Level-1
